attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-0780

Date: 2003-05-29

                 The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that:

 

(a) a Commission dedimus potestatem under the Great Seal of Canada do issue to the Honourable Marie Deschamps, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, the Honourable Michael A. Kelen, the Honourable Michel Beaudry, the Honourable Luc Martineau, the Honourable Carolyn A. Layden-Stevenson, the Honourable Simon Noël, the Honourable Judith A. Snider, the Honourable James Russell, the Honourable Johanne Gauthier and the Honourable James W. O’Reilly, Judges of the Federal Court of Canada - Trial Division, authorizing them to tender and administer to and take from all and every person or persons who now holds or hold or who shall hereafter hold any office or place of trust or profit or who may be appointed to discharge any duty within Canada, the Oath of Allegiance and such other oath or oaths as may from time to time be prescribed by any law or statute in that behalf made and provided; and

 

(b) a Commission dedimus potestatem under the Great Seal of Canada do issue authorizing each of the judges hereinafter named in the attached Schedule to tender and administer to and take from all and every person or persons who now holds or hold or who shall hereafter hold any office or place of trust or profit or who may be appointed to discharge any duty within the province or territory for which such judge was appointed, the Oath of Allegiance and such other oath or oaths as may from time to time be prescribed by any law or statute in that behalf made and provided.
